message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,500 is too low for me. Could you do $11,500?
I understand that $9,500 is a bit low, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
